message: is there a way to force the execution of an app as soon as the page gets loaded?
I think the javascript of an app gets executed once all the javascript files of the webpage are loaded
many times an app doesn't need those files and could be executed earlier
You are correct, the current architecture of KNS only begins executions after the page is fully loaded.
It might be possible to fire sooner, but that requires deeper understanding of the page load structure within the KBX. Not impossible, but not soon.
